post.text: Chip in to help make sure Donald Trump never becomes president: hrc.io/2edlMzW

comment.author: Dallas
comment.text: He made some stupid comments years ago. You should know about stupid comments and we have to dig in the past to fond something on him, but your scandals are the gift that keeps on giving. Am i going to get your private or public opinion today?

replies.author: Cortney
replies.text: Mitch McConnell and Paul Ryan were so disgusted they condemned his comments. Do you understand the significance of that, just weeks before the election? Of course you don't. You're too dumb. I'll tell you what it means: The orange-faced clown is done. Bye now.

replies.author: Dallas
replies.text: See i understand why you vote hillary u act just like her.. constantly put people down. Grow up.

replies.author: Dallas
replies.text: 11 YEARS AGO!!!!! Do you understand the significance of anything Clinton has lied and hid?? My point exactly

replies.author: Cortney
replies.text: You don't have a point. You can't even string a proper sentence together.
